title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 12 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Aug 12 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: New York's aggressive vaccine passport policy complicates Buck's trip to his brother's wedding. As covid cases surge, as do sales of fake vaccination cards – around $100 for something you could get free. C&B said they would be made an example of, like Martha Stewart, if they ever used fake covid IDs. New Orleans to require vaccines or negative tests for restaurants, other indoor activities. Former President Trump: ‘We Know Who Shot Ashli Babbitt.' Callers give their thoughts on mask mandate and vaccine passports.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
